1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.15: TESTING VERSION CHECKER. REMOVE ME AFTER.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.9.14:
New Features:
- Removed "Dynamic" prefix from localized branch names.
- Species name localizations (please be patient while add-ons catch up, species names will be unlocalized until new add-on releases are made with updated lang files).

Bugs Fixed:
- Dimensions other than 0 now grow trees properly again (bug introduced by Serene Seasons integration effort).
- Made rooty dirt blocks get color from mimic instead of grass (thanks Max Hyper).
- Fix optifine shader interaction bug where sky could be seen through breaking texture on trees.
- Fixed small crash with cactus model (thanks Max Hyper).

Internal:
- Enhanced SeasonHelper capabilities with helper functions.
- Removed "Wrapped" classes and redefined blockstate files to be more standard.
- Don't throw an exception when a JoCode file isn't defined.
